cast.overview: Determined to hold on to the throne, Cleopatra seduces the Roman emperor Julius Caesar. When Caesar is murdered, she redirects her attentions to his general, Marc Antony, who vows to take power—but Caesar’s successor has other plans.
cast.title: Cleopatra

details.biography: Peter Forster was born on June 29, 1920 in London, England. He was an actor, known for "Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)", "Mannix (1967)" and "Dangerous Charter (1962)". He was married to Jennifer Raine. He died on November 16, 1982 in Brentwood, California, USA.
details.name: Peter Forster
